name: Hamster Escape
description:
Short platformer prototype made with Unity for a class. 

Hamster on the run!

You play as a hamster desperately trying to escape from an evil lab overrun by zombie hamster. Defeat all the enemies and reach your hamster ball to escape!

Objective
  • Defeat all the enemies ; 
  • Reach the end of the level ;
Controls
  • W/A/S/D to move ;
  • Space to jump ;
